sense.name: handle or manipulate several components at once
sense.commentary: NOTE: Can also include examples referring to one component being in motion in multiple intervals.
sense.examples: I want to learn how to juggle. No one knows how she juggles kids and a career so successfully. We need to juggle the accounts to hide a deficit.

sense.name: influence by slyness
sense.examples: I can't believe he juggled all of us!
